text: @NYGovCuomo Man somethin EFFECTIVE needs to happen!1st this #Coronavirus pandemic thing?🦠Since...THREE MONTHS AGO!Gettin closer...to gettin back?2 a NEW NORMAL...NOW THESE DANG people!This is NEW YORK CITY...1 step closer to OPENING the CITY up!I REALLY need you and  DEBLASIO2 do somethn!✅
